**As a senior biostatistician, providing statistical input into Phase I - IV and medical device clinical trial development for over 50 international clinical trials in areas such as Oncology, Ophthalmology, Respiratory Disease, Chronic Pain, Allergology, Wound Care, Aesthetic Medicine, COVID19, and more, while utilizing a flexible range of statistical tools, including SAS and R programming. Anchored in solid statistical knowledge and an aggressive attitude, while also maintaining a conscientious and responsible work ethic to guarantee high-quality deliverables.**
